comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: She just died last year; an obituary: articles.chicagotribune.com/2011-03-01/features/ct-met-re... She was featured in a recent fundraising campaign at her alma mater, North Central College: northcentralcollege.edu/x47826.xml And on a personal note, she was born exactly on the same day as my grandmother, 29 November 1919.
